definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Han Seung Soo (1936-), South Korean diplomat and politician, prime minister from 2008

sentences.english: Soo here is the contest for logo all interested private me on PM.
sentences.chinese: 洙下面是所有感興趣的私人標誌在PM我比試比試。

sentences.english: Xuan Zhu is inside school exclusive a student that read, also do not have other friend.
sentences.chinese: 鉉洙是校內唯一一名讀書的學生，也沒有其他朋友。

sentences.english: Chang-soo and Eun-yeong are the married couple that own it.
sentences.chinese: 長洙和恩英是自己的已婚夫婦吧。

sentences.english: He has a brother named Kang-ho who is known as a 'die-hard detective'.
sentences.chinese: 鉉洙是校內唯一一名讀書的學生，也沒有其他朋友。

sentences.english: Kim spoke highly of the efforts made by China for the convening of this session.
sentences.chinese: 金學洙高度評價中方爲此次會議召開所作努力。

definition: name of a river/rushing of water
type of jade ornament for court dress (old)
stick-like implement inserted into the handles of a tripod cauldron in ancient times in order to lift the cauldron/commonly used in Korean names, transcribed as "hyun"
